verses.roman:
saṅkṣepe kahiluṅ--'prema'-prayojana-saṁvāda
vistāri' kahana nā yāya prabhura prasāda

synonyms: saṅkṣepe—briefly; kahiluṅ—I have described; prema-prayojana-saṁvāda—the discussion of the ultimate goal of life, love of Godhead; vistāri'-expansively; kahana—describing; nā yāya—not possible; prabhura prasāda—the benediction of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Thus I have briefly described a discussion of the ultimate goal of life, love of Godhead. The mercy of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu cannot be described expansively.
